title: My opinion how to fix Asol "W"
body:
The old Asol (W) ability made his his level one very abusive and almost always allows a easy level two advantage and roaming potential like he wanted to do with little counter play. With the recent changes to his (W) it has completely ruined what the champ was made to do. This change has made him into a burst mage and less of a control and kite mage with the new cool-down on his (W). This new ability takes away the skill to master a very unique champ that focuses on kiting and positioning, and turns him into a "blow all abilities at once and hopes he has enough ap to kill".

The issue with his early harassment was a issue and needed to be addressed, but in my opinion this was not the right fix. So below is my way how they should go about Asol

Make his (W) kinda like Kayle passive. Asol thematic is that he is this big dragon that can create planets and expand the universe (kinda like how his q works), and you can expand on this. 

When you put 1 point in your "W":    it works how it currently is with the short duration of range and has cool-down. Remove the increased speed on it
When you put 3 points in your "W":  it turns into the old Asol "W" and has the constant toggle and no cool-down unless hit by cc.
When you put 5 points into your "W": It gets the increase ball speed.



This should fix the issue of early harassment to some extent but its still possible. If it becomes an issue where Asol is rushing his 3 points into "w" too fast, they can always make it so you have to have two points into q before 3rd point into "w" (kinda like how yummi works.) It also expands on his thematic of constantly expanding the universe.

So I would love to hear feedback, maybe even get a word from a rioter on what they think about it. 

TLDR: combine both the old Asol "W" and new "W" 

Thank you for reading and hope to hear from others :D.

replies.body:

There is no way to combine both.
